mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PC_FAIR( BFNUM, BFNAME, BFDATE, BFPLACE, BFPHOTO, DELYN, IDATE, UDATE ) VALUES ( #{bfnum}, #{bfname}, #{bfdate}, #{bfplace}, #{bfphoto}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.BFNUM BFNUM ,A.BFNAME BFNAME ,A.BFDATE BFDATE ,A.BFPLACE BFPLACE ,A.BFPHOTO BFPHOTO ,A.UDATE UDATE FROM PC_FAIR A WHERE DELYN = 'Y' ORDER BY 1
mapper.update: UPDATE PC_FAIR SET DELYN = 'N', UDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELYN = 'Y' AND BFNUM = #{bfnum}
